private method Parser::List::AbsoluteValue::_check (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in _check: 10
sub _check {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{type}{list} = 0;
  $self->Error("Only one value allowed within absolute values")
    if ($self->{type}{length} != 1);
  my $arg = $self->{coords}[0];
  $self->Error("Absolute value can't be taken of %s",$arg->type)
    unless $arg->type =~ /Number|Point|Vector/ || $self->context->flag("allowBadOperands");
  $self->{type} = $Value::Type{number};
}

public method Parser::List::AbsoluteValue::perl (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in perl: 6
sub perl {
  my $self = shift; my $parens = shift;
  my $perl = 'abs('.$self->{coords}[0]->perl.')';
  $perl = '('.$perl.')' if $parens;
  return $perl;
}
